mdRecord.dcterms:title: Geological map of the Potomac basin west of Blue Ridge, Virginia and West Virginia: showing the relations of its upper Potomac coal basin and iron-ore bearing areas in reference to the West Virginia Central and Pittsburg [sic] R.R., and its connections and extensions / compiled from surveys by W.B. Rogers and others by Jed. Hotchkiss, Consulting Eng., etc., Staunton, Va., 1882 ; A. Hoen & Co., Photo. Lith., Baltimore
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: A. Hoen & Co.
Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
Rogers, W. B.
White, I. C. (Israel Charles), 1848-1927
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 35 x 57 cm. on sheet 44 x 61 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes cross-section at top right: Geological section across Georges Creek coal basin and eastward (scale 6000' to 1") by Prof. I.C. White, May 1881, Trans. Am. Phil. Soc.
From The Virginias, v. 3, no. 5, May 1882.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; mounted on linen.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Geology--Potomac River Valley--Maps.
Geology--Virginia--Maps.
Geology--West Virginia--Maps.
Geological cross sections--Virginia.
